descriptions:
Bring home the magic of the season with the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths—an all-in-one holiday decorating kit that instantly transforms any space into a festive wonderland. This coordinated set includes 1 prelit Christmas wreath adorned with natural-look pine cones and red berries, 2 lighted garlands, 2 oversized red bows, and a sturdy metal hanger for effortless setup.

Why you’ll love it:
- Warm, inviting glow: Battery-powered warm yellow LED lights create a cozy, elegant ambiance without messy cords.
- Full and lush greenery: Crafted from durable PE synthetic fir for a realistic look that lasts season after season.
- Generously sized pieces: A 17.72-inch wreath makes a striking statement; two 106-inch garlands with 10-inch diameter and 315 branch tips each beautifully frame mantels, doorways, and banisters; oversized bows (23.6 x 13.8 inches) add a classic finishing touch.
- Versatile decorating: Perfect for front doors, fireplaces, mantels, porches, Christmas trees, cabinets, shelves, homes, shops, hotels, and party backdrops.
- Easy to install: Comes with a metal hanger for quick, damage-free hanging—decorate in minutes.

Create a coordinated holiday look throughout your home with one elegant set. From the welcoming front door wreath to the sparkling garlands and bold red bows, every detail is designed to delight guests and make your Christmas shine. Gift-ready and family-friendly, the Yingzhao set is your shortcut to a picture-perfect holiday display.
